title: CryptClock
summary: A super quirky hidden number watch face. It's cool time!
description: CryptClock is a cool and stylish watch face with a twist!Learn to read the time hidden in the watches pattern, or shake your wrist to make the numbers pop-out!CryptClock is compatible with all Android Wear devices.CryptClocks colour configuration is fully customisable with the companion app! Note:  - A small in-app purchase is required to make style changes. - Don't see the watchface on the Android Wear device? Try the 'resync apps' option in the official Android Wear app on the handheld.
descriptionHTML:
CryptClock is a cool and stylish watch face with a twist!

Learn to read the time hidden in the watches pattern, or shake your wrist to make the numbers pop-out!

CryptClock is compatible with all Android Wear devices.

CryptClocks colour configuration is fully customisable with the companion app!

Note:
- A small in-app purchase is required to make style changes.
- Don't see the watchface on the Android Wear device? Try the 'resync apps' option in the official Android Wear app on the handheld.
